justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s incentives: B values committee RBs with upside and playoff schedules—exactly Derek Foster—so unlikely to sell him. B already has a Tier 1 QB and TE, making a QB4 and WR2 return unappealing. Rationale is generic and factually off (Lucas Flores has tough playoff matchups, not friendly). Value and roster fit are lopsided; 0.62 acceptance probability is unrealistic.
